description: Try our easy to follow Choc Hazelnut Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Hazelnut Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Use a palette knife to spread melted chocolate over a 40cm-long sheet of baking paper. Quickly sprinkle over half the chocolate bars and crispies. Put aside to set. Cut into shards and place on top of cake with remaining chocolate.
